photos.title: Photo Galleries
photos.description: Browse our curated photo galleries featuring the best shots from our events. Every photo in our galleries is also available in our complete archive.
photos.subtitle: Relive the best moments from our beach gatherings and special events
photos.googlePhotosDescription: Access our complete photo collection on Google Photos
photos.noPhotosDescription: Check back soon for new photo galleries
photos.instagramTagDescription: If you share these photos on Instagram, please tag us @Carioca_Coastal_Club
photos.galleryDescription: Gallery shows our best shots. All photos available in archive.
photos.galleryInfoDescription: This gallery showcases our best shots from the event. Every photo displayed here is also available in our complete archive, where you can find all photos taken during this time.

home.joinThousands: Join thousands of loyal customers who use Carioca Coastal Club to stay connected with their favorite barracas
home.popularDescription: These barracas are loved by our community - check if your favorite is open and reserve your spot
home.whyJoinDescription: More than just finding barracas - we're your connection to Rio's barraca culture
home.exclusiveDescription: Reserve chairs, get availability updates, discover new spots, and enjoy special offers from your favorite barracas
home.joinDescription: Start enjoying member benefits at your favorite barracas. Get updates, reserve chairs, and never miss out on the perfect barraca day.

personalizedRecommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations

footer.description: Connecting Rio's barraca lovers with their favorite spots through chair reservations, real-time updates, and exclusive member benefits.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Carioca Coastal Club. All rights reserved.

about.title: About Carioca Coastal Club
about.subtitle: We're the loyalty platform connecting Rio's barraca lovers with their favorite spots. Check if your barraca is open, reserve chairs, and enjoy exclusive member benefits.
about.missionDescription: To strengthen the bond between Rio's barraca community and their favorite spots. We believe loyal customers deserve better service, and barraca owners deserve loyal customers who keep coming back.
about.missionQuote: Every barraca has its regulars - we help strengthen those relationships.
about.missionDetails: Through chair reservations, real-time updates, and exclusive member perks, we make it easier for you to enjoy your favorite barraca spots while helping barracas build stronger customer loyalty.
about.valuesDescription: The values that drive our loyalty platform and community

passion.title: Passion for Rio
passion.description: We love Rio de Janeiro and want to connect barraca lovers with their favorite spots.

community.title: Community First
community.description: Building loyalty between customers and barracas through better communication and service.

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: Reserve chairs, get updates, and enjoy exclusive perks at participating barracas.

benefits.title: Member Benefits
benefits.description: Exclusive offers, priority service, and special events for loyal customers.

about.teamDescription: Barraca enthusiasts and tech experts working to strengthen Rio's barraca community

vincent.name: Vincent Wilson
vincent.bio: Born and raised in the United States, Vincent brings over 5 years of experience in international business development and relationship building across diverse markets.

hans.name: Hans Yadav
hans.bio: Experienced technology leader with expertise in customer service systems and digital platform development.

simon.name: Simon Paul
simon.bio: Tech enthusiast focused on creating seamless user experiences and optimizing operational processes.

jordi.name: Jordi De Avila
jordi.bio: Dedicated professional with expertise in business process optimization and customer relationship management.

ricardo.name: Ricardo Del Razo
ricardo.bio: Strategic partnership expert with experience in developing and maintaining key business relationships.

janeese.name: Janeesa Hollingshead
janeese.bio: Financial expert with extensive experience in strategic financial planning and business growth management.

leticia.name: Leticia Castilhos
leticia.bio: Digital marketing specialist focused on building engaging online communities and driving brand awareness through social media.

about.getInTouchDescription: Questions about membership? Want to partner with us? We'd love to hear from you.

discover.subtitle: Check if your favorite spot is open, reserve chairs, and discover new member benefits
discover.adjustCriteria: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters.

registration.title: Register Your Barraca
registration.subtitle: Register your barraca so we can work together. Fill out the form below to get started.

form.name: Barraca Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your barraca, specialties, and what makes it unique
form.vibeDescription: Select the type of vibe and atmosphere your barraca provides
form.defaultPhotoDescription: Upload a high-resolution photo that showcases what makes your barraca unique
form.partnershipDescription: Optional: Let us know if you're interested in these partnership opportunities
form.qrCodesDescription: Would you be willing to add QR codes for our website on your chairs and tables?
form.repeatDiscountsDescription: Would you offer discounts for repeat customers through our platform?
form.hotelPartnershipsDescription: Would you partner with hotels for special rates for their guests?
form.contentCreationDescription: Would you be willing to produce content together for Instagram/TikTok?
form.onlineOrdersDescription: Would you be willing to take orders via our site (orders sent to your WhatsApp)?
form.contactPreferencesDescription: Optional: Let us know if you're willing to be contacted for photos and status updates
form.contactForPhotosDescription: Can we contact you via WhatsApp or Instagram to collect photos of your barraca?
form.contactForStatusDescription: Can we contact you for open/closed status updates?
form.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 10MB
form.englishFluencyDescription: Do you have someone on staff who's fluent in English?
form.englishSpeakerNamesPlaceholder: Enter the name(s) of English-speaking staff members
form.tabSystemDescription: How do you track what was ordered by a person or group of people?
form.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Any other information you'd like to share
form.successMessage: Thank you for registering your barraca! We will review your information and contact you soon.
form.errorMessage: Failed to submit registration. Please try again.
form.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
form.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
